questions: how can i unblock my account?
answers: If your account gets blocked, please contact your nearest Customer Call Centre (for Credit Cards) and Banking centre (for Debit Cards).

questions: What is the initial deposit amount required to open the flexible account?
answers: The initial deposit amount to open a flexible current account is £5.

questions: details about my payments and transfers
answers: You can know your payments and transfers details by logging on to our Mobile Banking app or Online Banking.

questions: where can i see my pending transactions details
answers: You can get your pending transactions details by logging on to our Mobile Banking app or Online Banking. There’ll you see any payments or deposits that haven’t yet been debited from, or credited to your account.

questions: How will bank decide my home loan eligibility
answers: bank assess the customer's repayment capacity based on income, age, credit score, qualifications, number of dependants, spouse's income, assets, liabilities, stability and continuity of occupation, and savings history.

questions: how can i get loan details?
answers: You can visit your nearest banking branch and get full details.

questions: What if I want to repay the loan earlier than the due date
answers: If you want to repay your loan earlier than the due date, feel free to do so.

questions: How can i know my card details?
answers: You can know your card details by logging on to our Mobile Banking app or Online Banking and click on card controls.

questions: I've forgot my PIN what should i do?
answers: If you’ve forgotten the PIN for your credit card, you can view a reminder on the Mobile Banking App.
You’ll need to make one transaction using your PIN to activate the contactless feature.

questions: how can i edit my ATM limit?
answers: To increase or decrease your ATM withdrawal limit (subject to your available balance), please log on to your Mobile or Online Banking.

questions: need information about stolen or lost card
answers: If your card is lost or stolen, or likely to be misused, then please report this immediately using our Mobile App or Online Banking.
